paragraphs.text: Ready for the easiest move you’ve ever had? Call us today to see “The Furniture Taxi” standard! We promise you will notice the difference when you go through our booking process!
Call now or fill out the form, and we will call you ASAP!
"*" indicates required fields
ATLANTA – GEORGIA
Our Reviews​
ATLANTA – GEORGIA

At Atlanta Furniture Taxi, we’re a full-service moving company offering professional, reliable moving services for both homes and businesses. Our experienced moving team specializes in local and long-distance moving, making relocations within the Atlanta metro area or across the country completely stress-free. Whether you’re moving to a new house, relocating your business, or just shifting furniture within your home, we’ve got you covered.

Our Atlanta movers handle commercial moves, office relocations, packing and unpacking, loading and unloading for rental trucks or shipping containers, and even in-house moves. We offer affordable moving boxes, detailed labeling, crating, shipping, and additional services to ensure a smooth moving day. For storage, our secure, climate-controlled storage facility is ideal for short or long-term needs. We proudly serve the area and beyond, delivering the quality and dependability you’d expect from the top moving company in Atlanta. DOT# 2161279.
Atlanta Furniture Taxi is a full-service moving company serving the entire Atlanta, GA metro area!  Read More
We do home moves of all sizes! First home, growing family, or downsizing no matter the need we can help.  Read More
Moving your business...is our business. We are your licensed, insured, and trusted commercial relocation expert.  Read More
Atlanta Furniture Taxi services Atlanta and surrounding suburbs for quick, trustworthy, local moves. Read More
Atlanta Furniture Taxi can take you all over Georgia or all over the USA! Our dedicated, expedited service is available at flat rates - that means no surprises!  Read More
Atlanta Furniture Taxi offers climate-controlled storage for both long-term and short-term needs. We can receive your shipments at our loading docks for easy unloading.  Read More
ATLANTA – GEORGIA

With over 23 years of hands-on experience in relocation and moving services, our journey began with a clear mission: to become the most trusted and dependable Atlanta moving company. Living and working in a tech-driven, fast-growing city like Atlanta inspired us to rethink what people really need when searching for professional movers. After witnessing too many families and businesses fall victim to unreliable companies offering cheap rates and poor service, we knew it was time to offer a better solution.

That’s why we built Atlanta Furniture Taxi. We’re a team of honest, hardworking Atlanta movers dedicated to providing top-tier local moving and long-distance moving services with a personal touch. We believe Metro Atlanta area residents deserve more than just boxes and trucks. They deserve a moving team that’s professional, kind, respectful, and fueled by a “can-do” attitude. Today, we’re proud to be known as one of the most trusted local movers in Atlanta, bringing Southern hospitality to every move.

At Atlanta Furniture Taxi Moving Company, we know how important it is to meet customer expectations for our continued success. Our staff is 110% committed to providing you with the best services in Atlanta for your moving day, with a full team of skilled and friendly movers.

The Furniture Taxi Moving Atlanta, also known as Atlanta’s Furniture Taxi, is a small, family-owned and operated company, an active member of the Georgia Movers Association and the American Moving and Storage Association. We are a proud, accredited company of the Better Business Bureau with an A+ rating. We are also satisfactorily rated, authorized for hire, and licensed by the Georgia Department of Public Safety, certificate number GPSC#501257.

The moving team here is all pre-qualified by simple processes and procedures that are set in place prior to being considered for hire. Each team member is a U.S. citizen, background-checked, authorized by state authorities to enter your home or business, and thoroughly trained. They embody core values that you would proudly share with your parents. Reputation is everything in any business, especially when it comes to moving your home or office in Atlanta.

The building of something meaningful and the passion fueled behind the story! Chill out, Pop some good popcorn or order a pizza, sit back and relax, and experience the loss and gain that can occur instantly in anyone’s life. But it’s mostly about the simple facts of the term – never give up! Evolve or repeat, but it’s almost year 2020 and find out why we are the best moving company for your home or business in Atlanta.
Moving doesn’t have to be one of life’s most stressful experiences when you know the right strategies and techniques. Whether you’re planning to hire the
Figuring out how many moving boxes you need can feel overwhelming when you’re planning a move. The number of boxes depends on several factors, including
An excellent moving team always begins by selecting the right truck size, but many people struggle with this decision when planning their move. Selecting the

Atlanta Furniture Taxi stands out for our commitment to honest pricing, reliable service, and a professional moving team that truly cares. With over two decades of experience, we offer local and long-distance moving, secure storage, and personalized support to ensure a stress-free experience from start to finish. Our movers are background-checked, well-trained, and dedicated to delivering exceptional customer satisfaction on every move.

Our rates are based on several factors, including the distance of your move, the weight and volume of your items, the complexity of the move, and any additional services you may require, such as packing or storage. We recommend getting a detailed quote to understand the full breakdown of costs.

Atlanta Furniture Movers serves a wide range of areas in Metro Atlanta, including Alpharetta, Roswell, Sandy Springs, Brookhaven, Marietta, Kennesaw, Buford, Smyrna, Cumming, Johns Creek, and Buckhead.

Yes, Atlanta Furniture Taxi provides commercial moving services tailored to businesses of all sizes. Whether you’re relocating an office, moving equipment, or handling sensitive materials, our experienced team ensures your move is efficient and minimizes downtime. We take care of everything, from packing to setup, so your operations can continue without disruption.

At Atlanta Furniture Taxi, our mission is to provide professional and reliable transportation services you can trust. With a stellar reputation for being careful and dependable, we ensure your belongings are covered every step of the way. Whether it’s a local delivery or a full-scale move, our wonderful team and modern fleet are here to make your move seamless.
Contact us today to schedule your move. We’d be pleased to help you every step of the way, from door to door!
Contact us today. We are fully insured and licensed, plus members of Georgia Movers Association and American Moving and Storage Association with an A+ Rating with the Better Business Bureau.
